con:request.name: createProfile
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:sch="http://ereg.ets.org/external/service/soap/neea/schema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:thir="http://ereg.ets.org/external/service/soap/neea/profile/ThirdPartyProfileServices"> <soapenv:Header><wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"><wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-188A97C98AB3ACF83A15082577701591"><wsse:Username>Intsyseregdvi</wsse:Username><wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">1qaz@WSX</wsse:Password><wsse:Nonce EncodingType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-soap-message-security-1.0#Base64Binary">rNFwSG6od/yQuX3mbK1CwQ==</wsse:Nonce><wsu:Created>2017-10-17T16:29:30.154Z</wsu:Created></wsse:UsernameToken></wsse:Security>
</soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <thir:createProfileRequest> <requestHeader> <!--Optional:--> <informationCategory> <classificationCode>01</classificationCode> <classificationMessage/> </informationCategory> <clientTransactionId> <id>2</id>
</clientTransactionId> <requestTime>${DataGen#currentDate}</requestTime> <batchid> <id>${Properties#thirdPartyProfileId}11</id> <!--Optional:--> <guid>?</guid> </batchid> <!--Optional:--> <sessionid> <id>${Properties#thirdPartyProfileId}12</id> </sessionid> <!--Optional:--> <action>Profile.CreateProfile</action> <source>${#TestSuite#source}</source> <programCode>TEL</programCode> <!--Optional:--> <accountingDate>2016-08-30</accountingDate> <!--Optional:--> <requestsData> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <request> <name>citizenshipCountry</name> <data> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 7 items at this level--> <string>CHN</string> </data> </request> </requestsData> <accountingValue>${Properties#thirdPartyProfileId}22</accountingValue> <eventDate>${DataGen#eventDate}</eventDate> </requestHeader> <profile> <sch:dateOfBirth>1980-${DataGen#MM-DD}</sch:dateOfBirth> <sch:gender>M</sch:gender> <sch:lastName>ch${Properties#randomString}last</sch:lastName> <!--Optional:--> <sch:firstName>ch${Properties#randomString}first</sch:firstName> <!--Optional:--> <sch:middleName>m</sch:middleName> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <sch:address> <type>Primary</type> <addressLine1>${Properties#milliSeconds} ${Properties#randomString} line1</addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <addressLine2>${Properties#milliSeconds} ${Properties#randomString} line2</addressLine2> <city>Shenzhen</city> <country>CHN</country> <!--Optional:--> <provinceAndPostalCode> <otherPostal> <!--Optional:--> <otherProvince>Guangdong</otherProvince> <!--Optional:--> <otherPostalCode>518053</otherPostalCode> </otherPostal> </provinceAndPostalCode> <!--0 to 2 repetitions:--> <primaryPhone> <!--Optional:--> <countryISDCode>86</countryISDCode> <phoneNumber>${Properties#MMdd}${Properties#milliSeconds}001</phoneNumber> <!--Optional:--> <phoneExtension>111</phoneExtension> </primaryPhone> <!--0 to 2 repetitions:--> <alternatePhone> <!--Optional:--> <countryISDCode>86</countryISDCode> <phoneNumber>${Properties#MMdd}${Properties#milliSeconds}002</phoneNumber> <!--Optional:--> <phoneExtension>222</phoneExtension> </alternatePhone> <emailAddress>ch${Properties#randomString}@mail.com</emailAddress> <!--Optional:--> <mailingLabel>NTE4</mailingLabel> </sch:address> <sch:contactPreference>1</sch:contactPreference> <sch:validForMarketing>true</sch:validForMarketing> <sch:nativeLanguage>chi</sch:nativeLanguage> <sch:nativeCountry>CHN</sch:nativeCountry> <sch:LastModified>${DataGen#eventDate}</sch:LastModified> <!--Optional:--> <sch:searchServiceOptInStatus>N</sch:searchServiceOptInStatus> <sch:govermentIDs> <sch:type>International ID</sch:type> <sch:value>${Properties#ThirdPartyProfileId}${Properties#randomString}12</sch:value> <sch:issuingCountryCode>CHN</sch:issuingCountryCode> </sch:govermentIDs> </profile> <thirdPartyProfileID>${Properties#thirdPartyProfileId}${Properties#randomString}</thirdPartyProfileID> </thir:createProfileRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM ETS_CUST WHERE CUSTOMER_ID IN (SELECT CUSTOMER_ID FROM ETS_CUST_LNKG WHERE LNKG_TYP_CDE = 'DSPID' AND LNKG_KY = '${Properties#EtsProfileId}')

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM BKNG WHERE CUST_FST_NAM = 'ch${Properties#randomString}first' ORDER By DATE_CREATED DESC
SELECT * FROM BKNG WHERE CUST_FST_NAM = 'ch${Properties#randomString}first' ORDER By DATE_CREATED DESC
SELECT * FROM APPT_LNKG Where APPT_LNKG_TYP_CDE = 'TPAID' AND BKNG_ID IN (SELECT BKNG_ID FROM BKNG WHERE CUST_FST_NAM= 'ch${Properties#randomString}first')
SELECT * FROM ORG WHERE ORG_ID_NO IN (SELECT TST_CNTR_ID_NO FROM BKNG WHERE CUST_FST_NAM = 'ch${Properties#randomString}first')
SELECT * FROM CUST_SRCH_SVC WHERE CUSTOMER_ID IN (SELECT CUSTOMER_ID FROM ETS_CUST_LNKG WHERE LNKG_TYP_CDE = 'DSPID' AND LNKG_KY = '${Properties#EtsProfileId}')
